abstract: Michele Bachmann's New Hampshire staff, which quit en masse last week, called her national advisers "rude, unprofessional, dishonest and at times cruel."
snippet: Michele Bachmann's New Hampshire staff, which quit en masse last week, called her national advisers "rude, unprofessional, dishonest and at times cruel."
lead_paragraph: Members of Michele Bachmann's New Hampshire staff, who quit en masse last week, assailed her national campaign advisers in a statement on Monday, calling them "rude, unprofessional, dishonest and at times cruel."

headline.main: Bachmann's New Hampshire Staff Assails Campaign
